comments.html: I think it's not about ansible, the problem you pointed are much bigger. I saw funny case when one errorred config line completely block ol logic. For example interface name could be not recognized and device read several next lines belonging to previous recognized interface. When I need to do massive config change, I try to split this to several atomic update. This way takes more time to send updates to devices, but I found it less error prone.
comments.name: Andrey
